data.text:
@neilbosworth @yasserogier @cobuspienaar 
Hi Neil, could you please give the Questionable documents section a go please?
We added some functionality on handling the cases a bit better when it gets to the QD section.
We added 3 options: 
Force continue - where the document gets put on hold, but is able to continue and then you force it to the next step.
Cancel - still thinking about this, will speak to you about it.
Send back to queue - Cancel all work done on case and sent back to queue
